Title: KAFD Website
Description:
KAFD website is an automation of the existing problems that faces the KAFD in JUST regarding courses, students, registration, and other processes attached. 
This project is developed using ASP.NET.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
KAFD website is an automation of the existing problems that faces the KAFD in JUST regarding courses, students, registration, and other processes attached.
This project is developed using ASP.NET.



*King AbdAllah II Fund for Development website project is website the automates the processes with KAFD in order to make these processes more efficient & effective, less time consuming for different parties included. Moreover to keep a synchronized database of KAFD beneficiaries.

Along with the above, this project is provided as Student-Student course in which a team of ten students is divided into three different teams, each one of these teams is responsible to deliver specific topic to make this project work along with technical sessions for other teams.*
